Dr Thomas Ranner | School of Computer Science | University of Leeds Skip to main content University links Search Destination Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences site All leeds.ac.uk sites School of Computer Science Search Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences School of Computer Science People Profile Dr Thomas Ranner Position: Associate Professor Areas of expertise: Numerical methods for partial differential equations; mathematical and numerical analysis; computational modelling in biology Email: T.Ranner@leeds.ac.uk Phone: +44(0)113 343 4697 Location: 3.40d Sir William Henry Bragg Building Website: My Personal Site | Twitter | Googlescholar | ORCID Responsibilities Director of Equity, Diversity, Inclusion and Culture, School of Computer Science Research groups and institutes Computing in Biology, Medicine and Health Computational Science and Engineering

Postgraduate research opportunities

We welcome enquiries from motivated and qualified applicants from all around the world who are interested in PhD study. Our research opportunities allow you to search for projects and scholarships.
